page.title: 04TRANSPORT SURVEYS
page.content: On Monday 6th June between 1.35 and 1.50 we did a traffic survey on the roads leading to the big roundabout at the Arches. Coton Road, which is a dual carriageway, was the busiest with a total of 359 vehicles(275 cars,32 vans,27 lorries,11 motorbikes,3 buses,1 coach,3 mopeds,1 ambulance and 1 dustcart.) The Ringroad was the next busiest with 358 vehicles.Avenue Road,outside our school,had 236 vehicles.The quietest road was Coventry Road with only 89 vehicles. This was once the main road.We also decided to discover at random where 50 cars in the survey had been registered.20 were registered in Warwickshire or The West Midlands,9 in Leicestershire,18 in other English places,1 in Ireland,1 in Wales and one was a temporary resident.
